titleStmt.title: Various fragments of Aristophanes Acharnenses, with some unplaced fragments

availability.p: © Digital Corpus of Literary Papyri. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License .

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go
Finalized - This is good to go

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: 1.6 γε not θε; 2-3.3 the diaresis also needs a dot (add manually in xml); in 2-3.3 the reading is πε̣ριε[ίδεθ’; in 2-3.8 Θρᾷκας fix accent; fr. 5 indent lines 3-6; no [.?] at end of 5.2-3 before marginal comment; print the dotted letters in fr. 5 (and esp. l.6); in fr. 6 there’s a single dot in the first and second lines of the upper margin (no square brackets); 6.4-5 are indented, 6.6 and 6.9 is outdented; 6.11-12 are indented; remove word-wrap in 6.8 and 6.11; remove |alt| tags in 6.14 and place final sigma outside the square brackets; dot omicron in 6.15; remove word-wrap in 6.16; fix regularization in 7.4; in 7.5 it’s οἷον not οἷνον; remove period at end of 7.5; dot the final lambda in 7.10; dotted xi not zeta in 7.11; 8.1 is actually [.?].1[.?], so renumber; 8.4 has *dicolon*; last line of fr. 8 is [.?].2[.?]; line 1 of fr. 14 is actually [.?].2[.?], so renumber; 14.2 and 5-8 are indented, 9-10 are outdented; 14.9 begins ἐξ- not ἀξ- ; there’s a line not transcribed at 15.6; remove square brackets around .2 in 16.4 and .1 in 16.5, and in all lines of fr. 17-23. META: #2 in biblio 80209; add 70268 p.189; add 74441 (both are studies); update image link (http://163.1.169.40/cgi-bin/library?e=q-000-00---0POxy--00-0-0--0prompt-10---4------0-1l--1-en-50---20-about-4510--00031-001-0-0utfZz-8-00&a=d&c=POxy&cl=search&d=HASHde178c021c818dbb2607f4); add passage details and CWKB for Aristophanes (765) and Acharnians (1603);

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: 1.6 γε not θε; 2-3.3 the diaresis also needs a dot (add manually in xml); in 2-3.3 the reading is πε̣ριε[ίδεθ’; in 2-3.8 Θρᾷκας fix accent; fr. 5 indent lines 3-6; no [.?] at end of 5.2-3 before marginal comment; print the dotted letters in fr. 5 (and esp. l.6); in fr. 6 there’s a single dot in the first and second lines of the upper margin (no square brackets); 6.4-5 are indented, 6.6 and 6.9 is outdented; 6.11-12 are indented; remove word-wrap in 6.8 and 6.11; remove |alt| tags in 6.14 and place final sigma outside the square brackets; dot omicron in 6.15; remove word-wrap in 6.16; fix regularization in 7.4; in 7.5 it’s οἷον not οἷνον; remove period at end of 7.5; dot the final lambda in 7.10; dotted xi not zeta in 7.11; 8.1 is actually [.?].1[.?], so renumber; 8.4 has *dicolon*; last line of fr. 8 is [.?].2[.?]; line 1 of fr. 14 is actually [.?].2[.?], so renumber; 14.2 and 5-8 are indented, 9-10 are outdented; 14.9 begins ἐξ- not ἀξ- ; there’s a line not transcribed at 15.6; remove square brackets around .2 in 16.4 and .1 in 16.5, and in all lines of fr. 17-23. META: #2 in biblio 80209; add 70268 p.189; add 74441 (both are studies); update image link (http://163.1.169.40/cgi-bin/library?e=q-000-00---0POxy--00-0-0--0prompt-10---4------0-1l--1-en-50---20-about-4510--00031-001-0-0utfZz-8-00&a=d&c=POxy&cl=search&d=HASHde178c021c818dbb2607f4); add passage details and CWKB for Aristophanes (765) and Acharnians (1603);
